NewsArticle.Title: September Itemshop
NewsArticle.Content: Itemshop will be released on Wednesday September 24th Items will be located in "Costume" & "Hats". Coming soon: Weapon Skins This item will allow you to change the look of your one-handed weapon; the name along with all stats/attributes will remain the same. Once the weapon is changed it is no longer bankable. More Itemshop Armors & Headpiece There will be a steady flow of itemshop release in the coming months.
